resource_dependency.newsDataSchema: Database table 'news_articles' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), summary (text), content (text), published_at (datetime), category (string), author (string), image_url (string).

function: Display a list of agricultural news articles for users to browse.
static_description: The page shows a grid or list of news cards, each containing a thumbnail image referenced by image_url, title, summary, publication date, and category. Background is light cyan (#E0FFFF) and card borders use cadet blue (#5F9EA0).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a news card navigates the user to the full article view.
Hovering over a news card slightly elevates it and adds a shadow effect for emphasis.

resource_dependency.productDataSchema: Database table 'farm_products' with fields: id (UUID), name (string), description (text), price (decimal), category (string), origin (string), availability (boolean), image_url (string).

function: Allow users to view detailed information about various farm products.
static_description: Each product entry includes an image, name, category, brief description, and pricing. The layout uses light cyan background and cadet blue accents for titles and buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a product opens a modal or dedicated page showing extended details such as origin, availability status, and full description.

resource_dependency.weatherAPIIntegration: An external weather API providing current conditions and forecasts based on location input. Example parameters needed: latitude, longitude or city name.

function: Provide local weather forecasts relevant to farming activities.
static_description: Displays temperature, humidity, precipitation chance, wind speed, and UV index in a visually clear dashboard. Uses icons from weatherIcons and maintains the site’s light cyan and cadet blue theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can enter their location manually which triggers a refresh of displayed weather data via the integrated weatherAPIIntegration.

resource_dependency.searchEndpoint: Backend endpoint /api/search supporting query parameter 'q' for keyword search across news titles, product names, categories, etc.

function: Enable searching through agricultural content including news and products.
static_description: A prominent search bar positioned at the top of the navigation bar, featuring a magnifying glass icon from magnifyingGlassIcon, with placeholder text 'Search news, products...'. Styled with light cyan background and cadet blue border.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user types, auto-suggestions appear below the input field sourced dynamically from the searchEndpoint.
Pressing Enter or clicking the search button redirects to a results page listing matching items from both news and products.

resource_dependency.filterOptionsSchema: Predefined filter sets stored either in frontend constants or fetched from backend endpoints like /api/categories and /api/tags.

function: Allow filtering of news articles and farm products by predefined criteria.
static_description: Dropdown menus labeled 'Category', 'Date Range', and 'Availability' located above the main content areas. Styled with cadet blue headers and light cyan backgrounds.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on any dropdown toggles visibility of available filter options using dropdownArrowIcon rotation animation.
Choosing an option updates the displayed list of items instantly without reloading the entire page.

function: Apply a consistent light cyan background theme across all pages.
static_description: All sections and containers utilize light cyan (#E0FFFF) as the base background color defined in themeCSSVariables, ensuring visual consistency.

resource_dependency.uiElementColorScheme: CSS class definitions applying cadet blue (#5F9EA0) to buttons, links, headings, and interactive components.

function: Implement a unified cadet blue color scheme for all UI elements.
static_description: Buttons, form inputs, navigation tabs, and active states are styled with cadet blue (#5F9EA0) per uiElementColorScheme guidelines.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons darken slightly when hovered, maintaining accessibility contrast standards.

resource_dependency.paginationControls: Pagination logic handled client-side or server-side returning total_pages, next_page_url, prev_page_url.

function: Present a paginated list of news articles in chronological order.
static_description: Articles are listed vertically or in responsive grids depending on screen size. Includes pagination controls at bottom styled with cadet blue highlights.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking page numbers or next/previous arrows loads corresponding batches of articles via AJAX calls to backend.

resource_dependency.detailedViewModal: Modal overlay component rendering individual product details upon selection.

function: Organize and present a catalog of farm products with optional detailed views.
static_description: Products are shown in a categorized grid layout. Each item displays name, image, and basic info. Detailed views open modals with additional specs.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers detailedViewModal to show expanded product information while preserving context of the catalog.

resource_dependency.localForecastDataModel: Cached JSON structure holding recent forecast responses from weatherAPIIntegration indexed by location.

function: Serve a centralized dashboard for accessing localized weather forecasts.
static_description: Main panel displays hourly and weekly forecasts with graphical representations. Sidebar contains quick access to saved locations and alerts.

interaction_and_states.description: Manual refresh button fetches latest forecast from weatherAPIIntegration and updates cached entries accordingly.

resource_dependency.globalStylesheet: Unified CSS file enforcing consistent color usage across breakpoints and components.

function: Ensure cohesive styling with light cyan and cadet blue themes on every screen.
static_description: Every page inherits global styles from globalStylesheet that enforce background colors, font choices, spacing, and element coloring rules.

resource_dependency.contentManagementAPI: Admin-facing RESTful API endpoints allowing CRUD operations on news articles: POST /api/news, PUT /api/news/{id}, DELETE /api/news/{id}

function: Support publishing, editing, and removing agricultural news articles by administrators.
static_description: Admin interface features forms for entering article metadata, uploading images, selecting categories, and scheduling publish times. Styled consistently with existing theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends structured data to contentManagementAPI which stores or updates records in the news_articles database table.

resource_dependency.tagBasedFilteringMechanism: Tag system enabling multi-select filtering capabilities backed by product.tags field in database.

function: Categorize farm products and enable tag-based filtering mechanisms.
static_description: Sidebar or filter bar lists product categories retrieved from categoryFilterEndpoint. Tags associated with products allow refined selections.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting multiple tags narrows product listings to those tagged accordingly, updating the DOM in real time.

resource_dependency.realTimeWeatherService: WebSocket or polling mechanism connecting to external weatherAPIIntegration for live updates every X minutes.
resource_dependency.updateIntervalSetting: Configurable setting determining how frequently weather data should be refreshed.

function: Integrate real-time weather data into the application for timely farming insights.
static_description: Live indicators reflect current atmospheric pressure, rainfall probability, sunrise/sunset times updated automatically using realTimeWeatherService.

interaction_and_states.description: At intervals set by updateIntervalSetting, new readings replace outdated ones seamlessly within the UI.

resource_dependency.responsiveBreakpoints: Media queries targeting common device widths: mobile (<768px), tablet (768px–1024px), desktop (>1024px)
resource_dependency.adaptiveComponentLibrary: Prebuilt reusable components designed to scale proportionally under different viewport sizes.

function: Adapt layout and component sizing for optimal experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
static_description: Layout shifts between stacked columns on small screens and side-by-side arrangements on larger ones. Font sizes adjust relative to container width.

interaction_and_states.description: Components reflow smoothly according to adaptiveComponentLibrary constraints ensuring readability and usability regardless of screen dimensions.
